sys_ux_client_script.name: Refresh List

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_9c7cce12db9b359040eae46b13961917
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="List">d87c8e12db9b359040eae46b139619fe</macroponent><name>Refresh List</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({
      api,
      event: {
          payload,
          payload: {
              name,
              value,
              previousValue
          }
      },
      helpers,
      imports
    }) {
      if (name === 'screen' &&
          value.isActive != previousValue.isActive
          && value.isActive
          && api.state.hasRecordChanges) {
          api.setState('hasRecordChanges', false);
          api.setState('listRefresh', { timestamp: Date.now(), background: true });
      }
      if (name === 'activityLogs' && value && value.size > 0) {
        const operationList = ['modified', 'updated', 'inserted', 'deleted', 'closed'];
        // Transform "value" and get the latest entry
        const map = Array.from(value).pop()[1];
        const crudActivitiesLen = map.activities.get('crud').length;
        if (crudActivitiesLen < 1)
            return;
        const {
            operation,
            sysId,
            timestamp
        } = map.activities.get('crud')[crudActivitiesLen - 1];
        if (operationList.includes(operation) &&
            sysId !== "-1" &&
            !api.context.props.screen.isActive &&
            !api.state.hasRecordChanges) {
            api.setState('hasRecordChanges', true);
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>wbbusby</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-26 07:40:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>9c7cce12db9b359040eae46b13961917</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Refresh List</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NS Pro" source="x_g_sonc_ns_pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NS Pro">b5683ae81b157110824752c1604bcbc0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_9c7cce12db9b359040eae46b13961917</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>wbbusby</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-26 07:40:31</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
